To create the Windows Tufão installer, you should fill this folder with the appropriate files.

You should create 2 folder here:

  - main
    - include
      - Tufao
        - *: All header files
    - lib
      - tufao.lib,tufao_d.lib,tufao_d0.dll,tufao0.dll: MSVC build
    - doc
    - examples
  - routes-editor: The plugin config files editor
